casebody.data:
KING v. ELLIS, CORRECTIONS DIRECTOR. No. 4,

Misc.

Decided November 21, 1960. Petitioner pro se. Will Wilson, Attorney General of Texas, and Leon F. Pesek and Linward Shivers, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the District Court for a full hearing. Ellis v. United States, 356 U. S. 674.
